 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוּט‎</span>] **verb** ==treat with despite==, only Ezekiel (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שׁוּט‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***despise***; compare perhaps Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šâ‰u***</u></abbr>, ***rebel***, [[BDB#Meissn|Meissn]]); — only **Qal** ***Participle***, with accusative of person: masculine plural (substantive) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשָּׁאטִים אוֺתָם‎</span> [[Ezek.28.24|Ezek 28:24]]; [[Ezek.28.26|Ezek 28:26]] ([[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1. 108, 346</sup> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:72p»§ 72p</sup>); feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּנוֺת פְּלִשְׁתִּים הַשָּׁאטוֺת אוֺתָךְ‎</span> [[Ezek.16.57|Ezek 16:57]] ([[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ib. 189</sup>).
